COMMENT_TX: $the seventh homer of the game to break the ALCS record for most combined homers in one game; the Red Sox become the seventh team to hit three homers in one post-season inning

ej,farrj001,C,holbs901,Balls and strikes $Red Sox Pitching Coach John Farrell ejected by HP umpire Sam Holbrook for arguing balls and strikes from the dugout; the fifth Red Sox ejection in post-season
$infield shifted to right for David Ortiz
$infield shifted to right for Carlos Pena
$Kevin Youkilis had to run towards the line to get the bunt and had no chance to throw out Carlos Pena; B.J. Upton rounded the bag and Alex Cora came in behind to take the throw
$Jason Bay's bat broke and the barrel flew towards Evan Longoria at 3B; he fielded the ball at the bag and threw wildly past first
$Kevin Cash homered in his first post-season at bat
$Willy Aybar started towards 2B but Kevin Youkilis cut off the throw and relayed to 1B
$Evan Longoria homered in four consecutive games, an ALCS record; this was the 13th homer for the Rays to set a new ALCS record by breaking the mark of the 2003 Red Sox
$Evan Longoria dove to his left and deflected the ball
$Evan Longoria made a tough play on the grounder at the bag but threw the ball into the dirt

$the Red Sox came back from a seven-run deficit, which is the largest since the 1929 Athletics came back from an eight-run deficit to beat the Cubs in game four of the World Series; thus, this is the largest deficit overcome in LCS history; this is the eighth consecutive victory for the Red Sox in a post-season elimination game, all coming in the LCS (four games in 2004 and three in 2007)
$the ball struck the C ring and fell onto the field; it is a ground rule homer
$Jason Varitek fouled a pitch off the lower part of the mask of umpire Derryl Cousins; it drove his head down and the mask struck his clavicle

$the hard-hit ball struck James Shields' right foot on the side or back and caromed to Akinori Iwamura

$Umpire Derryl Cousins, who had been injured in the previous game, did not work this game; Angel Hernandez replaced Cousins; since Tim McClelland had taken over behind the plate in game six, Brian Gorman worked the plate in this game out of rotation
$infield shifted to right for Carlos Pena
